uvi.description:
scsi: iscsi: Fix conn use after free during resets

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.134 by commit d04958a348e560938410e04a12fb99da9c7e6a00. For more details please see the references link.
